sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import { Modal, Button, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap"; function ExpenseDetailPopup({ show, onClose, expense }) { if (!expense) { return null; } return (
Expense Details
Payer:

{expense.payer.name}

Amount Paid:

{expense.amount}

Description:

{expense.description}

Date:

{expense.date}

Expense Details
{expense.expense_details.map((detail) => (
{detail.user.name} owes{" "} {detail.amount_owed}
))}
); } export default ExpenseDetailPopup;
